item.description:
It's been a while since we had a burger and brews night at the Brewery Exchange...
meet upstairs in the pub for some inexpensive munchies, burgers and a beer. The Sox will be playing LA on the big screen at 7:05 and we can play some games of our own as well if anyone wants to bring some along. Anyone up for a Scrabble Tournament, Boggle...Apples to Apples? There is always pool and air hockey too. This is a great place to circulate and chat with each other too. Mark your calendars now. ;-)
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet upstairs next to the bar...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Baseball, Billiards, Burgers and Brews
